title: Stage Lv5-P1-S01
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The construction will have been completed by next month.
The report will have been submitted by Friday.
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The construction will have been completed by next month.
The report will have been submitted by Friday.
The project will have been finished by December.
The issues will have been resolved before the meeting.
The new policy will have been implemented by next year.
The contract will have been reviewed by next week.
All data will have been analyzed by the end of the month.
The system will have been tested after the upgrade.
